import React from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, Button,ListGroup,ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' const PlaceOrder = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const {adress,city,postalcode,country}=cart.shippingAdress return ( <>

Shipping

Adress {adress}, {city}, {postalcode}, {country}

Payment Method

{cart.paymentMethod}

 ) } export default PlaceOrder
